column4: odder i just want to know where i can get one those flash media players that i can set up in my web page
odder like yahoo perhaps that has the video player on the page so the people dont have to use their own media player
if you need to install flash, in a terminal and after quitting any browsers, type  sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
that's not really an appropriate question to ask here. Perhaps search for a web programming channel or try google.
